content: Savings General Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 04 Jul 2019What are some recommended high interest bank accounts out there?I feel like the money I have is rotting in my current bank account. I have some money set aside for investments but I'm thinking of somewhere I can get high i/r and is liquid. Is there another high interest bank account I can transfer my money to?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Elijah Lee, Independent Financial Advisor at Phillip Securities (Jurong East Lite)Top Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 04 Jul 2019Try playing the beta calculator here with your figures:https://seedly.sg/tools/savings-account-calculatorIt does depend on criteria specific to yourself, such as your salary credit, credit card spend, etc.I do not recommend spending on investments with the bank just to qualify for another 'level' of added interest.0 comments3
